siteMetadata.title: Jane Smith | Junior Full Stack Developer
siteMetadata.description: Junior Full Stack Developer passionate about building web applications with JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Recent coding bootcamp graduate with 2 years of professional experience.
siteMetadata.author: Jane Smith
siteMetadata.keywords: Jane Smith, Junior Developer, Full Stack Developer, Web Developer, JavaScript, React, Node.js, Portfolio, Austin, Texas, Coding Bootcamp Graduate

hero.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
hero.subtitle: Passionate about creating beautiful web experiences

bio.title: About Me
bio.imageAlt: Photo of Jane Smith smiling in a professional setting
paragraphs: I'm a Junior Full Stack Developer with a passion for creating intuitive and engaging web applications. After completing an intensive coding bootcamp, I've been working professionally for 2 years, constantly learning and improving my skills.

I specialize in JavaScript technologies, with experience in React for frontend development and Node.js for backend services. I love solving problems, learning new technologies, and collaborating with teams to build amazing products.
When I'm not coding, you can find me contributing to open source projects, reading tech blogs, or enjoying the Austin food scene. I'm always excited to take on new challenges and grow as a developer!

portfolio.title: Task Management App
portfolio.description: A full-stack task management application built with React, Node.js, and MongoDB. Features include user authentication, real-time updates, and a clean, intuitive UI.

portfolio.title: Weather Dashboard
portfolio.description: An interactive weather dashboard that fetches data from multiple APIs and displays current conditions and forecasts. Built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS.

portfolio.title: Personal Blog
portfolio.description: A personal blog built with Gatsby and hosted on Netlify. I write about my learning journey, tech tips, and project walkthroughs.

contact.title: Let's Build Something Together
contact.subtitle: I'm always excited to discuss new opportunities and collaborate on interesting projects

summary: Motivated Junior Full Stack Developer with a strong foundation in modern web technologies. Recent coding bootcamp graduate with 2 years of hands-on experience building responsive web applications. Proficient in JavaScript, React, and Node.js. Quick learner with a passion for clean code and user-centered design.

experience.title: Junior Full Stack Developer
responsibilities: Developed and maintained responsive web applications using React and Node.js
Collaborated with senior developers to implement new features and fix bugs
Wrote clean, maintainable code following best practices and team standards
Participated in code reviews and contributed to improving team processes
Integrated RESTful APIs and managed state with Redux

experience.title: Web Developer Intern
responsibilities: Built responsive landing pages and components using HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
Assisted in migrating legacy jQuery code to modern React components
Collaborated with design team to implement pixel-perfect UIs
Learned agile development methodologies and participated in daily standups

skills.Frontend: JavaScript (ES6+), React, HTML5, CSS3, Tailwind CSS, Redux, Responsive Design, Accessibility (A11Y)
skills.Backend: Node.js, Express, RESTful APIs, MongoDB, PostgreSQL, Authentication (JWT)
skills.Tools_and_Workflow: Git, GitHub, VS Code, npm, Webpack, Vite, Postman, Chrome DevTools
skills.Soft_Skills: Quick learner, team collaboration, problem-solving, communication, attention to detail
